content:
You're most welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to help. Setting up a separate section for digital coupons is a great idea, as it'll help you keep track of them and ensure you don't miss out on any savings.

Remember to also take advantage of Kroger's digital coupons, which can be loaded directly to your Plus Card. This will make it easy to redeem them at checkout.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further assistance. You're doing a fantastic job of getting organized and maximizing your savings. Keep up the great work!

Now, go forth and coupon like a pro!
